name: LoudounCountyVirginiaWeatherBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This will be a daily outlook for weather in Loudoun County Virginia. This outlook should not be considered an official forecast by the National Weather Service and used for any decisions regarding Life or Property. For this, please visit https://weather.gov.

This site is associated with the Facebook Page - https://www.facebook.com/loudounwx and the website https://www.loudounweather.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
